content:
Dear all,

Happy to share with you an online event organized in Colombia.

Un homenaje a William Lawvere - an homage to Bill Lawvere:

meet.google.com/wqp-syzo-qha
Lecturas de Lawvere desde Colombia
Reading Lawvere from Colombia

Viernes 19 de mayo de 2023 /Friday, 19 May 2023

Organizadores/ers: Universidad Nacional de Colombia (Fernando Zalamea), Universidad del Tolima (Arnold Oostra).

Lectures in Spanish, slides in English, discussion in both languages.

HomenajeLawvere.jpg

There is a new flyer for the event

avisoLawvere.pdf
